text: Tim McGraw and Faith Hill turn the heat up in their ` ` Speak to a Girl ` ` video. The country couple have released a number of steamy duets and videos over the years, but none more so than this one, which shows the superstars in private moments, sharing kisses, fingers intertwined, Hill laying with her head in her husband's lap. There are also shots of her sitting in his lap facing him, caressing his face while singing the lyrics directly to him, and later they face each other while passionately delivering the lyrics to the bridge, highlighting the natural chemistry that has no doubt helped keep them together for 20 years.
